hero.subtext: Choose your language. Hop into live video video chats with people around the world. Practice, laugh and improve together - anytime, anywhere.
hero.subButton: Be among the first to connect!

features.title: What Makes Us Different
features.subtitle: We focus on real connections, safety, and language freedom — here’s how.

connection.title: Instant Connection
connection.subtitle: No schedules, no waiting. Choose your language and start chatting right away.

safe.title: Safe & Respectful Community
safe.subtitle: Zero tolerance. Our smart moderation and ranking system keep things kind.

speak.title: Speak the Languages You Love
speak.subtitle: Select all the languages you speak and learn — we’ll match you accordingly.

CTA.title: Built for real connection
CTA.subtitle-1: Hey! I’m Juan — a language learner and software developer from Mexico. I'm building this app because I wanted a safe, fun, and instant way to speak with real people around the world.
CTA.subtitle-2: If that sounds like something you'd use, I’d love for you to be part of the beta.
